languages.text: Существо окружено особой аурой, которая уменьшает {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Ближний Бой{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Дальний Бой{/g} существ вокруг на −<u>(10 + 5 × {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} ВЫН Кроноса)</u>.
languages.original_text: The creature is surrounded by a special aura that reduces the {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g} of nearby creatures by −<u>(10 + 5 × Cronos' TGH {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g})</u>.

languages.text: The creature is surrounded by a special aura that reduces the {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g} of nearby creatures by −<u>(10 + 5 × Cronos' TGH {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g})</u>.
languages.original_text: Существо окружено особой аурой, которая уменьшает {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Ближний Бой{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Дальний Бой{/g} существ вокруг на −<u>(10 + 5 × {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} ВЫН Кроноса)</u>.

traits.locale_text: The creature is surrounded by a special aura that reduces the {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g} of nearby creatures by −<u>(10 + 5 × Cronos' TGH {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g})</u>.

The creature is surrounded by a special aura that reduces the {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g} of nearby creatures by −<u>(10 + 5 × Cronos' TGH {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g})</u>.

The creature is surrounded by a special aura that reduces the {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g} of nearby creatures by −<u>(10 + 5 × Cronos' TOU {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g})</u>.

languages.text: La criatura está rodeada por un aura especial que reduce la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Habilidad de armas{/g} y la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Habilidad de proyectiles{/g} de las criaturas cercanas en −<u>(10 + 5 × {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} por RES de Cronos)</u>.
languages.original_text: The creature is surrounded by a special aura that reduces the {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g} of nearby creatures by −<u>(10 + 5 × Cronos' TGH {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g})</u>.

traits.locale_text: La criatura está rodeada por un aura especial que reduce la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}HA{/g} y la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}HP{/g} de las criaturas cercanas en −<u>(10 + 5 × {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} por RES de Cronos)</u>.

languages.text: 此生物被特殊光环包围，周围所有生物的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}武器技能{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}弹道技能{/g}降低，等同于<u>（10+5×克罗诺斯的坚韧{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}）</u>。
languages.original_text: The creature is surrounded by a special aura that reduces the {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g} of nearby creatures by −<u>(10 + 5 × Cronos' TGH {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g})</u>.

traits.locale_text: 此生物被特殊光环包围，周围所有生物的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}武器技能{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}弹道技能{/g}降低，等同于<u>（10+5×克罗诺斯的坚韧{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}）</u>。
此生物被特殊光环包围，周围所有生物的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}武器技能{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}弹道技能{/g}降低，等同于<u>（10+5×克罗诺斯的坚韧{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}）</u>。

languages.text: その生物は近くの生物の{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}WS{/g}と{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}BS{/g}を−<u>(10+5×クロノスのTGH{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g})</u>)減らす特殊なオーラを纏っている。
languages.original_text: The creature is surrounded by a special aura that reduces the {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g} of nearby creatures by −<u>(10 + 5 × Cronos' TGH {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g})</u>.

traits.locale_text: その生物は近くの生物の{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}WS{/g}と{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}BS{/g}を−<u>(10+5×クロノスのTOU{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g})</u>減らす特殊なオーラを纏っている。
その生物は近くの生物の{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}近接攻撃{/g}と{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}射撃技能{/g}を−<u>(10+5×クロノスのTOU{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g})</u>)減らす特殊なオーラを纏っている。

languages.text: Die Kreatur ist von einer besonderen Aura umgeben, die die {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Waffenfähigkeit{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistik-Fähigkeit{/g} von Kreaturen in der Nähe um −<u>(10 + 5 × ZÄH-{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g} von Cronos )</u> reduziert.
languages.original_text: The creature is surrounded by a special aura that reduces the {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g} of nearby creatures by −<u>(10 + 5 × Cronos' TGH {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g})</u>.

traits.locale_text: Die Kreatur ist von einer besonderen Aura umgeben, die die {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}WF{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}BF{/g} von Kreaturen in der Nähe um -<u>(10 + 5× Cronos-ZÄH-{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g} )</u> reduziert.

Die Kreatur ist von einer besonderen Aura umgeben, die die {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Waffenfähigkeit{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistik-Fähigkeit{/g} von Kreaturen in der Nähe um −<u>(10 + 5 × ZÄH-{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g} von Cronos )</u> reduziert.

languages.text: La créature est entourée d'une aura spéciale qui réduit de <u>(10 + 5 × {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} d'END de Cronos)</u> la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Capacité de combat{/g} et la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Capacité de tir{/g} des créatures à proximité.
languages.original_text: The creature is surrounded by a special aura that reduces the {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g} of nearby creatures by −<u>(10 + 5 × Cronos' TGH {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g})</u>.

traits.locale_text: La créature est entourée d'une aura spéciale qui réduit de <u>(10 + 5 × {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} d'END de Cronos)</u> la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Capacité de combat{/g} et la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Capacité de tir{/g} des créatures à proximité.

languages.text: Yaratık, yakındaki yaratıkların {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Silah Yeteneği{/g} ve {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Balistik Yetenek{/g} niteliklerini <u>(10 + 5 × Kronos'un DAY {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonusu{/g})</u> kadar azaltan özel bir aurayla çevrilir.
languages.original_text: The creature is surrounded by a special aura that reduces the {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g} of nearby creatures by −<u>(10 + 5 × Cronos' TGH {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g})</u>.

traits.locale_text: Yaratık, yakındaki yaratıkların {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Silah Yeteneği{/g} ve {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Balistik Yetenek{/g} niteliklerini <u>(10 + 5 × Kronos'un DAY {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonusu{/g})</u> kadar azaltan özel bir aurayla çevrilir.
